Translations.Text: Indagano y’Imana n’indagano Imana idatabwa mugabo abantu benshi ntavyo bazi
Barafise ubumenyi buboneka bujanye n’ubuzima bwo ng’aha kw’isi, mugabo bakihenda n’ubuzima bwo mw’ijuru budahera
Mbega ntibiyumvira mumitima yabo yuko Imana itaremye Amajuru n’Isi hamwe n’ibirimwo vyose yuko ari ivy’ukuri, no kugihe cagenywe mu vy’ukuri abantu benshi ntibavyemera yuko bazohura n’Umuremyi wabo

Mbega ntibagenda genda kuri iy’Isi turiko nukuraba ukugene yabaye amaherezo y’aba bantu bamyeho imbere yabo, nabo bari bafise ubushobozi buhanitse kubasumba, bakaba barima kuri iy’Isi nuku yiringaniza neza kubasumba uko bahora bayi ringaniza, n’intumwa zabo z’Imana zarabashikiye zifise ibimenyetso biri k’umugaragaro, rero Imana ntiyari kubahemukira, mugabo nibo bonyene bahemukiye imitima yabo
Hanyuma impera yabagize amabi yose nuguhakana amajambo y’Imana matagatifu nukuyatyoza
Imana rugira vyose niyo yatanguje kurema ibiremwa vyose, kandi niyo izobigarura hanyuma bize bisubizwe iwe
N’umusi umuhero w’Isi uzoshika, inkozi z’ibibi zose zizo debukirwa
Ntibazoba bafise uwubasabira mubo bahora bagereranyako	n’ibindi bintu, nabo bagereranywako n’ibindi bintu bazoba hakana icese
N’umusi	w’umuhero	w’Isi	uzoboneka	kuri	uwo	musi	abantu bazocanamwo
Nayo	abemeye	Imana	yabo	y’ukuri	nukugira	ibikorwa	vyiza, bazonezerezwa nabo bari mumirima iteye igomwe iri mw’ijuru
